title: Announcing .NET MAUI in .NET 8 Release Candidate 1: Quality
description: We are very excited to announce the availability of .NET MAUI in .NET 8 release candidate 1 which comes with a go live license so you can confidently use this release for your production applications.

title: Are You Prepared for the End of Xamarin Support?
description: In October 2022, Microsoft announced that Xamarin and Xamarin.Forms apps will no longer be supported after May 1, 2024, which is just eight months from the writing of this post.

title: SKIE is Open Source
description: SKIE, our tool to bridge Kotlin and Swift APIs for Kotlin Multiplatform, has been released as open source. This is a critical tool for any developer or team calling Kotlin code from Swift.

title: Test Driven Development in Android Apps – A Practical Guide to TDD
description: TDD, or Test-Driven Development, is a software development approach where tests are written before the actual code is implemented.

title: Uno Platform 4.10 — .NET MAUI Embedding, 150+ UI Controls, and more
description: The 4th release of 2023 brings over 350+ updates to Uno Platform, including the much-requested .NET MAUI Embedding, Lightweight Styling, Shadows, Hot Restart, WebAssembly CSP, and more.
